content.text: Match ends, Watford 2, Southampton 2.
Second Half ends, Watford 2, Southampton 2.
Foul by Daryl Janmaat (Watford).
Mario Lemina (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Southampton. Josh Sims replaces James Ward-Prowse.
Substitution, Southampton. Sofiane Boufal replaces Dusan Tadic.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Christian Kabasele.
Cédric Soares (Southampton) is shown the yellow card.
Goal!  Watford 2, Southampton 2. Abdoulaye Doucouré (Watford) with an attempt from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Troy Deeney with a headed pass.
Dusan Tadic (Southampton) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Marvin Zeegelaar (Watford).
Shane Long (Southampton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Shane Long (Southampton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Dusan Tadic (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Alex McCarthy (Southampton) is shown the yellow card.
Oriol Romeu (Southampton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Stefano Okaka (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oriol Romeu (Southampton).

Foul by Pierre-Emile Højbjerg (Southampton).
Abdoulaye Doucouré (Watford) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Andre Gray (Watford) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Daryl Janmaat with a cross.
Attempt missed. Pierre-Emile Højbjerg (Southampton) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Ryan Bertrand.

Substitution, Southampton. Mario Lemina replaces Steven Davis.
Attempt missed. André Carrillo (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a corner.

Foul by Pierre-Emile Højbjerg (Southampton).
André Carrillo (Watford) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Watford 1, Southampton 2. Andre Gray (Watford) header from very close range to the bottom right corner.
